description: Observability and testing: structured logs, Prometheus metrics, OpenTelemetry traces, and test harnesses for integration/e2e.
steps: Add structured logging and basic metrics in core modules.
Instrument critical code paths with tracing spans.
Create test harness that spins up ephemeral Postgres+AGE containers for integration tests (via docker-compose or testcontainers).
Implement e2e scenarios for ingestion → enrichment → sync.
